level.text: The contracting officer shall publicize the District’s intent to enter into a sole source contract in accordance with the provisions of chapter 13 of this title.
The contracting officer shall publicize all sole source contracts in accordance with the provisions of chapter 13.

If a grant or law requires a specific vendor to provide certain goods or services for a requirement, the contracting officer does not have to publicize the notice of intent to enter into a sole source contract.
